name: Wireless Earbuds
description: High-quality wireless earbuds with noise cancellation and long battery life.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: Great product, but battery life could be better.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Powerful gaming laptop with high-performance graphics and fast processing speed.

reviews.name: Alice Green
reviews.comment: Handles all my games smoothly, absolutely worth it!

name: Yoga Mat
description: Durable and non-slip yoga mat for all your workout and stretching needs.

reviews.comment: Good quality, but slightly thinner than expected.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass and waterproof design.

reviews.name: Emma White
reviews.comment: Great sound quality and easy to carry!

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and comfortable running shoes for daily jogging and sports activities.

reviews.comment: Good fit, but I wish there were more color options.
